venue.name: Unitarian Congregation of Mendon and Uxbridge

item.description:
What a great way to end the weekend.  Listening to some great music in a casual and relaxed environment.

The duo shares close vocal harmonies in their folk and country songs that are accompanied by acoustic instruments - a 6 string guitar, ukulele, banjo, tin whistle, harmonica - for an afternon of lively entertainment.

Donations for the Mendon Food Pantry - especially laundry detergent, antibacterial soaps and cleaning products would be most graciously accepted.

Concert begins at 4 pm so let's meet inside at the entrance at 3:45 pm.
item.why: Enjoy a relaxing late afternoon listening to Americana Folk Duo.
item.name: Last Minute Event for this Sunday
